trans-unit.source: Represents a connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close" />, <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.BeginDbTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel)" />, <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ChangeDatabase(System.String)" />, <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.CreateDbCommand" />, <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" />, and <see cref="E:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.StateChange" />.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />，必须重写以下成员： <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close" />， <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.BeginDbTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel)" />， <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ChangeDatabase(System.String)" />， <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.CreateDbCommand" />， <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" />，和<see cref="E:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.StateChange" />。

trans-unit.source: You must also provide the following properties: <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Database" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ServerVersion" />, and <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State" />.
trans-unit.target: 你还必须提供以下属性： <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString" />， <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Database" />， <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.DataSource" />， <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ServerVersion" />，和<see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the isolation level for the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定事务的隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating your own connection type, override this method to implement the code necessary to begin a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建您自己的连接类型，重写此方法以实现开始事务所需的代码。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level for the specific type of connection is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定隔离级别，使用特定类型的连接的默认隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level for the specific type of connection is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定隔离级别，使用特定类型的连接的默认隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the isolation level for the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定事务的隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的隔离级别启动数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the database for the connection to use.
trans-unit.target: 为要使用的连接指定数据库名称。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current database for an open connection.
trans-unit.target: 为打开的连接更改当前数据库。

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the `databaseName` parameter must be a valid database name for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 中提供的值`databaseName`参数必须是当前实例的有效的数据库名称。

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是关闭任何打开连接的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A> method rolls back any pending transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A>方法回滚任何挂起的事务。

trans-unit.source: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将释放到连接池，连接或关闭的连接，如果禁用连接池。

trans-unit.source: An application can call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A> more than one time.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A>不止一次。

trans-unit.source: No exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 不会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> goes out of scope, it is not closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>超出范围，它没有闭合是。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`，这在功能上等效。

trans-unit.source: If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，则也会释放物理连接。

trans-unit.source: Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a **Connection**, a **DataReader**, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`上**连接**、 **DataReader**，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`你类的方法。

trans-unit.source: In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly.
trans-unit.target: 在终结器中，你应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。

trans-unit.source: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: 打开连接时出现的连接级别的错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于打开连接的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string used to establish the initial connection.
trans-unit.target: 用来建立初始连接的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。

trans-unit.source: To determine which settings are valid, see the documentation for the specific type of connection that you are using.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定哪些设置有效，请参阅你使用的连接的特定类型的文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time to wait while establishing a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取在建立连接时终止尝试并生成错误之前所等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is determined by the specific type of connection that you are using.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是由您正在使用的连接的特定类型确定的。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回与当前连接关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回与当前连接关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If you are implementing your own connection, override this method to implement the code necessary to create and return a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要实现您自己的连接，重写此方法以创建并返回需要在代码中实现<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database after a connection is opened, or the database name specified in the connection string before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在连接打开之后获取当前数据库的名称，或者在连接打开之前获取连接字符串中指定的数据库名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A connection typically updates this property dynamically when the current database changes.
trans-unit.target: 连接通常此属性动态更改时，更新当前数据库。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 获取要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the database server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the connection to the database is closed, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.DataSource%2A> returns whatever is contained in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> for the `DataSource` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库的连接已关闭，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.DataSource%2A>返回中包含的所有内容<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>为`DataSource`关键字。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open and the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> data source keyword's value starts with "|`datadirectory`|", the property returns whatever is contained in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> for the `DataSource` keyword only.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接是打开和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>数据源关键字的值开头"|`datadirectory`|"，该属性返回中包含的所有内容<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>为`DataSource`仅关键字。

trans-unit.source: If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`, and if that is empty, the native provider's `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库的连接处于打开状态，该属性返回本机提供程序返回有关`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`，和的是否为空，本机提供程序的`DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`返回。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: A set of methods for creating instances of a provider's implementation of the data source classes.
trans-unit.target: 一组方法的集合，这些方法用于创建提供程序对数据源类的实现的实例。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an existing <see cref="T:System.Transactions.Transaction" /> in which to enlist.
trans-unit.target: 对用于登记的现有 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.Transaction" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Enlists in the specified transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在指定事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the `EnlistTransaction` method to enlist in a distributed transaction.
trans-unit.target: 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用`EnlistTransaction`方法在分布式事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: Because it enlists a connection in a <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> instance, `EnlistTransaction` takes advantage of functionality available in the <xref:System.Transactions> namespace for managing distributed transactions.
trans-unit.target: 因为它登记中的连接<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>实例，`EnlistTransaction`中可用的功能利用<xref:System.Transactions>命名空间用于管理分布式事务。

trans-unit.source: Once a connection is explicitly enlisted in a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.
trans-unit.target: 连接程序显式在事务中登记之后，它无法取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: 包含架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the schema to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> using the specified string for the schema name.
trans-unit.target: 使用表示架构名称的指定字符串返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: 包含架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collectionName" /> is specified as null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collectionName" /> 被指定为空。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the schema to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.
trans-unit.target: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
trans-unit.target: 使用表示架构名称的指定字符串以及表示限制值的指定字符串数组返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: 包含架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection.
trans-unit.target: `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*深度的值，指定特定集合的限制集合。

trans-unit.source: In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for.
trans-unit.target: 为了对给定的限制，设置值和设置的其他限制的值，你需要设置前面的限制条件为 null，然后为你想要为指定值的限制中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: An example of this is the "Tables" collection.
trans-unit.target: 此示例为"表"集合。

trans-unit.source: If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name) and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you must pass in the following values at least: null, "Carl".
trans-unit.target: 如果"表"集合具有三个限制 （数据库、 所有者和表名称），并且你想要取回仅与"Carl"的所有者关联的表，则必须传递以下值至少： null，"Carl"。

trans-unit.source: If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction.
trans-unit.target: 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。

trans-unit.source: This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是不同于传入的参数值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可为指定的参数的值。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collectionName" /> is specified as null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collectionName" /> 被指定为空。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.StateChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Data.StateChangeEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.StateChange" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.StateChange" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关概述，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OnStateChange(System.Data.StateChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OnStateChange(System.Data.StateChangeEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OnStateChange(System.Data.StateChangeEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OnStateChange(System.Data.StateChangeEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString" /> 所指定的设置打开数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: This method must be overridden with user-defined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户定义的行为，必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will throw an exception if called again without first being closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 如果情况下再次调用将引发异常前关闭。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: 打开集合时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: This method implements an asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" /> 的异步版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" />, which opens a database connection with the settings specified by the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" />的异步版本，打开由 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString" />指定的设置的数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the virtual method <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> with CancellationToken.None.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过 CancellationToken.None 调用虚拟方法 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Connecting> until the returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is completed.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A>，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A>必须返回<xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Connecting>直到返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>完成。

trans-unit.source: Then, if the connection was successful, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Open>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，如果连接成功，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A>必须返回<xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Open>。

trans-unit.source: If the connection fails, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Closed>.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接失败，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A>必须返回<xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Closed>。

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A> will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A>将尝试取消或关闭相应<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation instruction.
trans-unit.target: 取消指令。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 这是 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" /> 的异步版本。

trans-unit.source: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应使用合适的实现进行重写。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token can optionally be honored.
trans-unit.target: 可选择性接受取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the synchronous <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" /> call and returns a completed task.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用同步 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Open" /> 调用并返回已完成任务。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的 cancellationToken。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by Open will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.
trans-unit.target: Open 引发的异常将通过返回的任务异常属性传递。

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the <see langword="DbConnection" /> object until the returned Task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 <see langword="DbConnection" /> 对象的其他方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Connecting> until the returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is completed.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A>，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A>必须返回<xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Connecting>直到返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>完成。

trans-unit.source: Then, if the connection was successful, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Open>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，如果连接成功，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A>必须返回<xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Open>。

trans-unit.source: If the connection fails, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A> must return <xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Closed>.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接失败，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.State%2A>必须返回<xref:System.Data.ConnectionState.Closed>。

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A> will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.Close%2A>将尝试取消或关闭相应<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents the version of the server to which the object is connected.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示对象所连接到的服务器的版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The version of the database.
trans-unit.target: 数据库的版本。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string returned depends on the specific type of connection you are using.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串的格式取决于您正在使用的连接的特定类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ServerVersion" /> was called while the returned Task was not completed and the connection was not opened after a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync" />.
trans-unit.target: 当返回的任务未完成，且在调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.OpenAsync" /> 后未打开连接时，调用了 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ServerVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述连接状态的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 连接的状态。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string returned depends on the specific type of connection you are using.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串的格式取决于您正在使用的连接的特定类型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of the event changes.
trans-unit.target: 当事件状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.StateChange> event occurs when the state of the event changes from closed to opened, or opened to closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.StateChange>发生事件的事件来自的更改到已关闭的状态打开，或打开到结束时。

trans-unit.source: Begins a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始一项数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: Begins a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始一项数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Begins a database transaction with the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> 值开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object that is associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回与当前连接关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object that is associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 与连接关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Commands and Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md) and <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.CreateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[命令和参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md)和<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.CreateCommand%2A>。
